cards.name: Crack Shot
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to cancel 1<nonbreak><evade> result.

cards.name: Daredevil
cards.ability_text: While you perform a white <boost> action, you may treat it as red to use the [1<nonbreak><leftturn>] or [1<nonbreak><rightturn>] template instead.

cards.name: Debris Gambit
cards.ability_text: While you perform a red <evade> action, if there is an obstacle at range 0–1, treat the action as white instead.

cards.name: Elusive
cards.ability_text: While you defend, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 defense die.<return>After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

cards.name: Expert Handling
cards.ability_text: <flavor>While heavy fighters can often be coaxed into a barrel roll, seasoned pilots know how to do it without putting undue stress on their craft or leaving themselves open to attack.</flavor>

cards.name: Fearless
cards.ability_text: While you perform a <frontarc> primary attack, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the defender’s <frontarc>, you may change 1 of your results to a <hit> result.

cards.name: Intimidation
cards.ability_text: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

cards.name: Juke
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender’s <evade> results to a <focus> result.

cards.name: •Lone Wolf
cards.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0–2, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 of your dice.

cards.name: Marksmanship
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

cards.name: Outmaneuver
cards.ability_text: While you perform a <frontarc> attack, if you are not in the defender’s firing arc, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

cards.name: Predator
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may reroll 1 attack die.

cards.name: Ruthless
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at range 0–1 of the defender. If you do, that ship suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage and you may change 1 of your die results to a <hit> result.

cards.name: Saturation Salvo
cards.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> from that upgrade. If you do, choose two defense dice. The defender must reroll those dice.

cards.name: Selfless
cards.ability_text: While another friendly ship at range 0–1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><crit> damage to cancel 1<nonbreak><crit> result.

cards.name: •Squad Leader
cards.ability_text: While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

cards.name: Swarm Tactics
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

cards.name: Trick Shot
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

cards.name: Heightened Perception
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, engage at initiative 7 instead of your standard initiative value this phase.

cards.name: Instinctive Aim
cards.ability_text: While you perform a special attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to ignore the <focus> or <targetlock> requirement.

cards.name: Sense
cards.ability_text: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 ship at range 0–1 and look at its dial. If you spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>, you may choose a ship at range 0–3 instead.

cards.name: Supernatural Reflexes
cards.ability_text: Before you activate, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform a <barrelroll> or <boost> action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on your action bar, suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

cards.name: Advanced Sensors
cards.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may perform 1 action.<return>If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

cards.name: Collision Detector
cards.ability_text: While you boost or barrel roll, you can move through and overlap obstacles.<return>After you move through or overlap an obstacle, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to ignore its effects until the end of the round.

cards.name: Fire-Control System
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

cards.name: Trajectory Simulator
cards.ability_text: During the System Phase, if you would drop or launch a bomb, you may launch it using the [5<nonbreak><straight>] template instead.

cards.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all <crit> results to <hit> results.

cards.name: Ion Cannon
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

cards.name: Jamming Beam
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict jam tokens instead of damage.

cards.name: Tractor Beam
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict tractor tokens instead of damage.

cards.name: Dorsal Turret
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack</smallcaps>

cards.name: Ion Cannon Turret
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

cards.name: Adv. Proton Torpedoes
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

cards.name: Ion Torpedoes
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

cards.name: Proton Torpedoes
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

cards.name: Barrage Rockets
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1 or more <standardcharge> to reroll that many attack dice.

cards.name: Cluster Missiles
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0–1 of the defender, ignoring the <targetlock> requirement.

cards.name: Concussion Missiles
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0–1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

cards.name: Homing Missiles
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After you declare the defender, the defender may choose to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps and the attack is treated as hitting.

cards.name: Ion Missiles
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

cards.name: Proton Rockets
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

cards.name: Freelance Slicer
cards.ability_text: While you defend, before attack dice are rolled, you may spend a lock you have on the attacker to roll 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker gains 1 jam token. Then, on a <hit> or <crit> result, gain 1 jam token.

cards.name: GNK “Gonk” Droid
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to recover 1 shield.

cards.name: •Informant
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> After placing forces, choose 1 enemy ship and assign the <smallcaps>Listening Device</smallcaps> condition to it.

cards.name: Novice Technician
cards.ability_text: At the end of the round, you may roll 1 attack die to repair 1 faceup damage card. Then on a <hit> result, expose 1 damage card.

cards.name: Perceptive Copilot
cards.ability_text: After you perform a <focus> action, gain 1 focus token.

cards.name: Seasoned Navigator
cards.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

cards.name: Tactical Officer
cards.ability_text: <flavor>In the chaos of a starfighter battle, a single order can mean the difference between a victory and a massacre.</flavor>

cards.name: Hotshot Gunner
cards.ability_text: While you perform a <turretarc> attack, after the Modify Defense Dice step, the defender removes 1 focus or calculate token.

cards.name: Skilled Bombardier
cards.ability_text: If you would drop or launch a device, you may use a template of the same bearing with a speed 1 higher or lower.

cards.name: Veteran Tail Gunner
cards.ability_text: After you perform a primary <frontarc> attack, you may perform a bonus primary <reararc> attack.

cards.name: Veteran Turret Gunner
cards.ability_text: After you perform a primary attack, you may perform a bonus <turretarc> attack using a <turretarc> you did not already attack from this round.

cards.name: R2 Astromech
cards.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

cards.name: R3 Astromech
cards.ability_text: You can maintain up to 2 locks. Each lock must be on a different object.<return>After you perform a <targetlock> action, you may acquire a lock.

cards.name: R4 Astromech
cards.ability_text: Decrease the difficulty of your speed 1–2 basic maneuvers (<leftturn>, <leftbank>, <straight>, <rightbank>, <rightturn>).

cards.name: R5 Astromech
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to repair 1 facedown damage card.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Repair 1 faceup <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> damage card.

cards.name: •Cloaking Device
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a <cloak> action.<return>At the start of the Planning Phase, roll 1 attack die. On a <focus> result, decloak or discard your cloak token.

cards.name: Contraband Cybernetics
cards.ability_text: Before you activate, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, until the end of the round, you can perform actions and execute red maneuvers, even while stressed.

cards.name: Deadman’s Switch
cards.ability_text: After you are destroyed, each other ship at range 0–1 suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

cards.name: Feedback Array
cards.ability_text: Before you engage, you may gain 1 ion token and 1 disarm token. If you do, each ship at range 0 suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

cards.name: Inertial Dampeners
cards.ability_text: Before you would execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 shield. If you do, execute a white [0<nonbreak><stop>] instead of the maneuver you revealed, then gain 1 stress token.

cards.name: Rigged Cargo Chute
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Drop 1 loose cargo using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

cards.name: Ablative Plating
cards.ability_text: Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

cards.name: Advanced SLAM
cards.ability_text: After you perform a <slam> action, if you fully executed the maneuver, you may perform a white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

cards.name: Afterburners
cards.ability_text: After you fully execute a speed 3–5 maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a <boost> action, even while stressed.

cards.name: Electronic Baffle
cards.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage to remove 1 red token.

cards.name: Engine Upgrade
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Large military forces such as the Galactic Empire have standardized engines, but individual pilots and small organizations often replace the power couplings, add thrusters, or use high-performance fuel to get extra push out of their engines.</flavor>

cards.name: Hull Upgrade
cards.ability_text: <flavor>For those who cannot afford an enhanced shield generator, bolting additional plates onto the hull of a ship can serve as an adequate substitute.</flavor>

cards.name: Munitions Failsafe
cards.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> you spent as a cost for the attack.

cards.name: Shield Upgrade
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Deflector shields are a substantial line of defense on most starships beyond the lightest fighters. While enhancing a ship’s shield capacity can be costly, all but the most confident or reckless pilots see the value in this sort of investment.</flavor>

cards.name: Static Discharge Vanes
cards.ability_text: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0–1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead.

cards.name: Stealth Device
cards.ability_text: While you defend, if your <standardcharge> is active, roll 1 additional defense die.<return>After you suffer damage, lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

cards.name: Tactical Scrambler
cards.ability_text: While you obstruct an enemy ship’s attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

cards.name: •Baze Malbus
cards.ability_text: While you perform a <focus> action, you may treat it as red. If you do, gain 1 additional focus token for each enemy ship at range 0–1, to a maximum of 2.

cards.name: •C-3PO
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>Before rolling defense dice, you may spend 1 calculate token to guess aloud a number 1 or higher. If you do and you roll exactly that many <evade> results, add 1<nonbreak><evade> result.</smallbody><return><smallbody>After you perform the <calculate> action, gain 1 calculate token.</smallbody>

cards.name: •Cassian Andor
cards.ability_text: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 1–2 and guess aloud a bearing and speed, then look at that ship’s dial. If the chosen ship’s bearing and speed match your guess, you may set your dial to another maneuver.

cards.name: •Chewbacca
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 2 <standardcharge> to repair 1 faceup damage card.

cards.name: •“Chopper”
cards.ability_text: During the Perform Action step, you may perform 1 action, even while stressed. After you perform an action while stressed, suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage unless you expose 1 of your damage cards.

cards.name: •Hera Syndulla
cards.ability_text: You can execute red maneuvers even while stressed. After you fully execute a red maneuver, if you have 3 or more stress tokens, remove 1 stress token and suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

cards.name: •Jyn Erso
cards.ability_text: If a friendly ship at range 0–3 would gain a focus token, it may gain 1 evade token instead.

cards.name: •Kanan Jarrus
cards.ability_text: After a friendly ship at range 0–2 fully executes a white maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to remove 1 stress token from that ship.

cards.name: •Lando Calrissian
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Roll 2 defense dice. For each <focus> result, gain 1 focus token. For each <evade> result, gain 1 evade token. If both results are blank, the opposing player chooses focus or evade. You gain 1 token of that type.

cards.name: •Leia Organa
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 3 <standardcharge>. During this phase, each friendly ship reduces the difficulty of its red maneuvers.

cards.name: •Magva Yarro
cards.ability_text: After you defend, if the attack hit, you may acquire a lock on the attacker.

cards.name: •Nien Nunb
cards.ability_text: Decrease the difficulty of your bank maneuvers (<leftbank> and <rightbank>).

cards.name: •R2-D2
cards.ability_text: During the End Phase, if you are damaged and not shielded, you may roll 1 attack die to recover 1 shield. On a <hit> result, expose 1 of your damage cards.

cards.name: •Sabine Wren
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Place 1 ion, 1 jam, 1 stress, and 1 tractor token on this card. <return>After a ship suffers the effect of a friendly bomb, you may remove 1 ion, jam, stress, or tractor token from this card. If you do, that ship gains a matching token.

cards.name: •Saw Gerrera
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage to change all of your <focus> results to <crit> results.

cards.name: •“Zeb” Orrelios
cards.ability_text: You can perform primary attacks at range 0. Enemy ships at range 0 can perform primary attacks against you.

cards.name: •Bistan
cards.ability_text: After you perform a primary attack, if you are focused, you may perform a bonus <turretarc> attack against a ship you have not already attacked this round.

cards.name: •Ezra Bridger
cards.ability_text: After you perform a primary attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform a bonus <turretarc> attack from a <turretarc> you have not attacked from this round. If you do and you are stressed, you may reroll 1 attack die.

cards.name: •Han Solo
cards.ability_text: During the Engagement Phase, at initiative 7, you may perform a <turretarc> attack. You cannot attack from that <turretarc> again this round.

cards.name: •Luke Skywalker
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to rotate your <turretarc> indicator.

cards.name: •“Chopper”
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1 non-recurring <nonbreak><standardcharge> from another equipped upgrade to recover 1 shield. <return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 2 shields to recover 1 non-recurring <standardcharge> on an equipped upgrade.

cards.name: •R2-D2
cards.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

cards.name: •R5-D8
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to repair 1 facedown damage card.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Repair 1 faceup <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> damage card.

cards.name: •<italic>Ghost</italic>
cards.ability_text: You can dock 1 attack shuttle or <italic>Sheathipede</italic>-class shuttle.<return>Your docked ships can deploy only from your rear guides.

cards.name: •<italic>Millennium Falcon</italic>
cards.ability_text: While you defend, if you are evading, you may reroll 1 defense die.

cards.name: •<italic>Moldy Crow</italic>
cards.ability_text: Gain a <frontarc> primary weapon with a value of “3.”<return>During the End Phase, do not remove up to 2 focus tokens.

cards.name: •<italic>Outrider</italic>
cards.ability_text: While you perform an obstructed attack, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.<return>After you fully execute a maneuver, if you moved through or overlapped an obstacle, you may remove 1 of your red or orange tokens.

cards.name: •<italic>Phantom</italic>
cards.ability_text: You can dock at range 0–1.

cards.name: Pivot Wing (Open)
cards.ability_text: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

cards.name: Pivot Wing (Closed)
cards.ability_text: While you defend, roll 1 fewer defense die.<Return>After you execute a [0<nonbreak><stop>] maneuver, you may rotate your ship 90º or 180º.<return>Before you activate, you may flip this card.

cards.name: Servomotor S-foils (Open)
cards.ability_text: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

cards.name: Servomotor S-foils (Closed)
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, roll 1 fewer attack die.<return>Before you activate, you may flip this card.

cards.name: •Admiral Sloane
cards.ability_text: After another friendly ship at range 0–3 defends, if it is destroyed, the attacker gains 2 stress tokens.<return>While a friendly ship at range 0–3 performs an attack against a stressed ship, it may reroll 1 attack die.

cards.name: •Agent Kallus
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Assign the <smallcaps>Hunted</smallcaps> condition to 1 enemy ship.<return>While you perform an attack against the ship with the <smallcaps>Hunted</smallcaps> condition, you may change 1 of your <focus> results to a <hit> result.

cards.name: •Ciena Ree
cards.ability_text: After you perform a <coordinate> action, if the ship you coordinated performed a <barrelroll> or <boost> action, it may gain 1 stress token to rotate 90°.

cards.name: •Darth Vader
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc at range 0–2 and spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, that ship suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage unless it chooses to remove 1 green token.

cards.name: •Death Troopers
cards.ability_text: During the Activation Phase, enemy ships at range 0–1 cannot remove stress tokens.

cards.name: •Director Krennic
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Before placing forces, assign the <smallcaps>Optimized Prototype</smallcaps> condition to another friendly ship.

cards.name: •Emperor Palpatine
cards.ability_text: While another friendly ship defends or performs an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to modify 1 of its dice as though that ship had spent 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>.

cards.name: •Grand Inquisitor
cards.ability_text: After an enemy ship at range 0–2 reveals its dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform 1 white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

cards.name: •Grand Moff Tarkin
cards.ability_text: During the System Phase, you may spend 2 <standardcharge>. If you do, each friendly ship may acquire a lock on a ship that you have locked.

cards.name: ISB Slicer
cards.ability_text: During the End Phase, enemy ships at range 1–2 cannot remove jam tokens.

cards.name: •Minister Tua
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if you are damaged, you may perform a red <reinforce> action.

cards.name: •Moff Jerjerrod
cards.ability_text: During the System Phase, you may spend 2 <standardcharge>. If you do, choose the [1<nonbreak><leftbank>], [1<nonbreak><straight>], or [1<nonbreak><rightbank>] template. Each friendly ship may perform a red <boost> action using that template.

cards.name: •Seventh Sister
cards.ability_text: If an enemy ship at range 0–1 would gain a stress token, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to have it gain 1 jam or tractor token instead.

cards.name: •Fifth Brother
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to change 1 of your <focus> results to a <crit> result.

cards.name: •<italic>Dauntless</italic>
cards.ability_text: After you partially execute a maneuver, you may perform 1 white action, treating that action as red.

cards.name: Os-1 Arsenal Loadout
cards.ability_text: While you have exactly 1 disarm token, you can still perform <torpedo> and <missile> attacks against targets you have locked. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during the attack.<return>Add <torpedo> and <missile> slots.

cards.name: Xg-1 Assault Configuration
cards.ability_text: While you have exactly 1 disarm token, you can still perform <cannon> attacks. While you perform a <cannon> attack while disarmed, roll a maximum of 3 attack dice.<return>Add <cannon> slot.
At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0–1. If you do, you gain 1 calculate token unless that ship chooses to gain 1 stress token.
cards.restrictions_raw: Scum or squad including Darth Vader

cards.name: •4-LOM
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, after rolling attack dice, you may name a type of green token. If you do, gain 2 ion tokens and, during this attack, the defender cannot spend tokens of the named type.

cards.name: •Boba Fett
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Start in reserve.<return>At the end of Setup, place yourself at range 0 of an obstacle and beyond range 3 of any enemy ship.

cards.name: •Cad Bane
cards.ability_text: After you drop or launch a device, you may perform a red <boost> action.

cards.name: •Cikatro Vizago
cards.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may choose 2 <illicit> upgrades equipped to friendly ships at range 0–1. If you do, you may exchange these upgrades.<return><smallcaps>End of Game:</smallcaps> Return all <illicit> upgrades to their original ships.

cards.name: •IG-88D
cards.ability_text: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the <sabold>IG-2000</sabold> upgrade.<return>After you perform a <calculate> action, gain 1 calculate token.

cards.name: •Jabba the Hutt
cards.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0–2 and spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, that ship recovers 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> on 1 of its equipped <illicit> upgrades.

cards.name: •Ketsu Onyo
cards.ability_text: At the start of the End Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0–2 in your firing arc. If you do, that ship does not remove its tractor tokens.

cards.name: •Latts Razzi
cards.ability_text: While you defend, if the attacker is stressed, you may remove 1 stress from the attacker to change 1 of your blank/<focus> results to an <evade> result.

cards.name: •Maul
cards.ability_text: After you suffer damage, you may gain 1 stress token to recover 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>.<return>You can equip “Dark Side” upgrades.
cards.restrictions_raw: Scum or squad including Ezra Bridger

cards.name: •Unkar Plutt
cards.ability_text: After you partially execute a maneuver, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage to perform 1 white action.

cards.name: •Zuckuss
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you are not stressed, you may choose 1 defense die and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the defender must reroll that die.

cards.name: •Bossk
cards.ability_text: After you perform a primary attack that misses, if you are not stressed, you <bold>must</bold> receive 1 stress token to perform a bonus primary attack against the same target.

cards.name: •BT-1
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result for each stress token the defender has.
cards.restrictions_raw: Scum or squad including Darth Vader

cards.name: •Dengar
cards.ability_text: After you defend, if the attacker is in your firing arc, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, roll 1 attack die unless the attacker chooses to remove 1 green token. On a <hit> or <crit> result, the attacker suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

cards.name: •Greedo
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.<return>While you defend, if your <standardcharge> is active, the attacker may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

cards.name: •“Genius”
cards.ability_text: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you have not dropped or launched a device this round, you may drop 1 bomb.

cards.name: •R5-P8
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack against a defender in your <frontarc>, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 attack die. If the rerolled result is a <crit> result, suffer 1<nonbreak><crit> damage.

cards.name: •R5-TK
cards.ability_text: You can perform attacks against friendly ships.

cards.name: •<italic>Andrasta</italic>
cards.ability_text: Add <bomb> slot.

cards.name: •<italic>Havoc</italic>
cards.ability_text: Remove <crew> slot. Add <sensor> and <astro> slots.

cards.name: •<italic>Hound’s Tooth</italic>
cards.ability_text: 1 Z-95-AF4 headhunter can dock with you.

cards.name: <italic>IG-2000</italic>
cards.ability_text: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the <sabold>IG-2000</sabold> upgrade.

cards.name: •<italic>Marauder</italic>
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary <reararc> attack, you may reroll 1 attack die.<return>Add <gunner> slot.

cards.name: •<italic>Mist Hunter</italic>
cards.ability_text: Add <cannon> slot.

cards.name: •<italic>Punishing One</italic>
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <frontarc>, roll 1 additional attack die.<return>Remove <crew> slot. Add <astro> slot.

cards.name: •<italic>Shadow Caster</italic>
cards.ability_text: After you perform an attack that hits, if the defender is in your <turretarc> and your <frontarc>, the defender gains 1 tractor token.

cards.name: •<italic>Slave I</italic>
cards.ability_text: After you reveal a turn (<leftturn> or <rightturn>) or bank (<leftbank> or <rightbank>) maneuver, you may set your dial to the maneuver of the same speed and bearing in the other direction.<return>Add <torpedo> slot.

cards.name: •<italic>Virago</italic>
cards.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a red <boost> action.<return>Add <mod> slot.

cards.name: Composure
cards.ability_text: After you fail an action, if you have no green tokens, you may perform a <focus> action.

cards.name: •Chewbacca
cards.ability_text: At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 focus token to repair 1 of your faceup damage cards.

cards.name: •L3–37’s Programming
cards.ability_text: If you are not shielded, decrease the difficulty of your bank (<leftbank> and <rightbank>) maneuvers.

cards.name: •L3–37
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.<return>While you defend, you may flip this card. If you do, the attacker must reroll all attack dice.

cards.name: •Lando Calrissian
cards.ability_text: After you roll dice, you may spend 1 green token to reroll up to 2 of your results.

cards.name: •Tobias Beckett
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> After placing forces, you may choose 1 obstacle in the play area. If you do, place it anywhere in the play area beyond range 2 of any board edge or ship and beyond range 1 of other obstacles.

cards.name: •Qi’ra
cards.ability_text: While you move and perform attacks, you ignore obstacles that you are locking.

cards.name: Agile Gunner
cards.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may rotate your <turretarc> indicator.

cards.name: •Han Solo
cards.ability_text: Before you engage, you may perform a red <focus> action.

cards.name: •Lando’s <italic>Millennium Falcon</italic>
cards.ability_text: 1 Escape Craft may dock with you.<return>While you have an escape craft docked, you may spend its shields as if they were on your ship card.<return>While you perform a primary attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack die.

cards.name: •<italic>ST-321</italic>
cards.ability_text: After you perform a <coordinate> action, you may choose an enemy ship at range 0–3 of the ship you coordinated. If you do, acquire a lock on that enemy ship, ignoring range restrictions.

cards.name: Bomblet Generator
cards.ability_text: <smallbody><bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Bomblet with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 shield to recover 2 <standardcharge>.</smallbody>

cards.name: Conner Nets
cards.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Conner Net using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

cards.name: Proton Bombs
cards.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Proton Bomb using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

cards.name: Proximity Mines
cards.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Proximity Mine using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

cards.name: Seismic Charges
cards.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Seismic Charge with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

cards.name: Fanatical
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not shielded, you may change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to a <hit> result.

cards.name: Advanced Optics
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 focus token to change 1 of your blank results to a <hit> result.

cards.name: Hyperspace Tracking Data
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Before placing forces, you may choose a number between 0 and 6. Treat your initiative as the chosen value during Setup.<return>After Setup, assign 1 focus or evade token to each friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–2.

cards.name: Pattern Analyzer
cards.ability_text: While you fully execute a red maneuver, before the Check Difficulty step, you may perform 1 action.

cards.name: Primed Thrusters
cards.ability_text: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform <barrelroll> and <boost> actions even while stressed.

cards.name: Targeting Synchronizer
cards.ability_text: While a friendly ship at range 1–2 performs an attack against a target you have locked, that ship ignores the<nonbreak><targetlock> attack requirement.

cards.name: •Captain Phasma
cards.ability_text: At the end of the Engagement Phase, each enemy ship at range 0–1 that is not stressed gains 1 stress token.

cards.name: •General Hux
cards.ability_text: While you perform a white <coordinate> action, you may treat it as red. If you do, you may coordinate up to 2 additional ships of the same ship type, and each ship you coordinate must perform the same action, treating that action as red.

cards.name: •Kylo Ren
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Choose 1 enemy ship at range 1–3. If you do, spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to assign the <smallcaps>I’ll Show You the Dark Side</smallcaps> condition to that ship.

cards.name: •Petty Officer Thanisson
cards.ability_text: During the Activation or Engagement Phase, after an enemy ship in your <frontarc> at range 0–1 gains a red or orange token, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship gains 1 additional token of the type that it gained.

cards.name: •Supreme Leader Snoke
cards.ability_text: During the System Phase, you may choose any number of enemy ships beyond range 1. If you do, spend that many <forcecharge> to flip each chosen ship’s dial faceup.

cards.name: Special Forces Gunner
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary <frontarc> attack, if your <turretarc> is in your <frontarc>, you may roll 1<nonbreak>additional attack die.<return>After you perform a primary <frontarc> attack, if your <turretarc> is in your <reararc>, you may perform a bonus primary <turretarc> attack.

cards.name: Heroic
cards.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if you have only blank results and have 2 or more results, you may reroll any number of your dice.

cards.name: •C-3PO
cards.ability_text: While you coordinate, you can choose friendly ships beyond range 2 if they have<nonbreak><calculate> on their action bar.<return>After you perform the<nonbreak><calculate> or<nonbreak><coordinate> action, gain 1<nonbreak>calculate token.

cards.name: •Chewbacca
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return>After a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–3 is dealt 1<nonbreak>damage card, recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return>While you perform an attack, you may spend 2<nonbreak><standardcharge> to change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to a<nonbreak><crit> result.

cards.name: •Han Solo
cards.ability_text: After you perform an <evade> action, gain additional evade tokens equal to the number of enemy ships at range 0–1.

cards.name: •Rose Tico
cards.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 of your results to acquire a lock on the enemy ship.

cards.name: •Finn
cards.ability_text: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the enemy ship is in your <frontarc>, you may add 1 blank result to your roll (this die can be rerolled or otherwise modified).

cards.name: •Paige Tico
cards.ability_text: After you perform a primary attack, you may drop 1 bomb or rotate your <turretarc>.<return>After you are destroyed, you may drop 1 bomb.

cards.name: •Rey
cards.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if the enemy ship is in your <turretarc>, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to change 1 of your blank results to a <evade> or <hit> result.

cards.name: •BB-8
cards.ability_text: Before you execute a blue maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a<nonbreak><barrelroll> or<nonbreak><boost> action.

cards.name: BB Astromech
cards.ability_text: Before you execute a blue maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a <barrelroll> action.

cards.name: •M9-G8
cards.ability_text: While a ship you are locking performs an attack, you may choose 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker rerolls that die.

cards.name: •R2-HA
cards.ability_text: While you defend, you may spend your lock on the attacker to reroll any number of your defense dice.

cards.name: •R5-X3
cards.ability_text: Before you activate or engage, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to ignore obstacles until the end of this phase.

cards.name: •<italic>Black One</italic>
cards.ability_text: After you perform a <slam> action, lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Then you may gain 1 ion token to remove 1 disarm token.<return>If your <standardcharge> is inactive, you cannot perform the <slam> action.

cards.name: •Rey’s <italic>Millennium Falcon</italic>
cards.ability_text: If you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can execute red Segnor’s Loop [<leftsloop> or <rightsloop>] maneuvers and perform <boost> and<nonbreak><rotate> actions even while stressed.

cards.name: Integrated S-foils (Closed)
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is not in your <bullseye>, roll 1 fewer attack die.<return>Before you activate, you may flip this card.

cards.name: Integrated S-foils (Open)
cards.ability_text: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

cards.name: Ferrosphere Paint
cards.ability_text: After an enemy ship locks you, if you are not in that ship’s <bullseye>, that ship gains 1 stress token.

cards.name: Hate
cards.ability_text: After you suffer 1 or more damage, recover that many <forcecharge>.

cards.name: Predictive Shot
cards.ability_text: After you declare an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, during the Roll Defense Dice step, the defender cannot roll more defense dice than the number of your <hit>/<crit> results.

cards.name: Biohexacrypt Codes
cards.ability_text: While you coordinate or jam, if you have a lock on a ship, you may spend that lock to choose that ship, ignoring range restrictions.

cards.name: Treacherous
cards.ability_text: While you defend, you may choose a ship obstructing the attack and spend 1 <standardcharge>. If you do, cancel 1 <hit> or <crit> result, and the ship you chose gains 1 strain token.<return>After a ship at range 0–3 is destroyed, recover 1 <standardcharge>.

cards.name: •TV-94
cards.ability_text: While a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–3 performs a primary attack against a defender in its <bullseye>, if there are 2<nonbreak>or fewer attack dice, it may spend 1<nonbreak>calculate token to add 1<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>result.

cards.name: •Kraken
cards.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may choose up to 3<nonbreak>friendly ships at range<nonbreak>0–3. If you do, each of these ships does not remove 1<nonbreak>calculate token.

cards.name: Energy-Shell Charges
cards.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Attack (<calculate>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. While you perform this attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak>calculate token to change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to a <crit> result.<return><smallcaps>Action</smallcaps>: Reload this card.</smallbody>

cards.name: •<italic>Soulless One</italic>
cards.ability_text: While you defend, if the attacker is outside your firing arc, you may reroll 1<nonbreak>defense die.

cards.name: Impervium Plating
cards.ability_text: Before you would be dealt a faceup <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> damage card, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to discard it instead.

cards.name: Grappling Struts (Open)
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>You ignore obstacles at range<nonbreak>0 and while you move through them. After you reveal your dial, if you reveal a maneuver other than a [2<nonbreak><straight>] and are at range 0 of an asteroid or debris cloud, skip your Execute Maneuver step and remove 1 stress token; if you revealed a right or left maneuver, rotate your ship 90º in that direction. After you execute a maneuver, flip this card.</smallbody>

cards.name: Brilliant Evasion
cards.ability_text: While you defend, if you are not in the attacker's <bullseye>, you may spend 1 <forcecharge> to change 2 of your <focus> results to <evade><nonbreak>results.

cards.name: •K2-B4
cards.ability_text: While a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–3 defends, it may spend 1 calculate token. If it does, add 1 <evade> result unless the attacker chooses to gain 1<nonbreak>strain token.

cards.name: •Darth Sidious
cards.ability_text: After you perform a purple<nonbreak><coordinate><nonbreak>action, the ship you coordinated gains 1<nonbreak>stress token. Then, it gains 1<nonbreak>focus token or recovers 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>.

cards.name: •Count Dooku
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>Before a ship at range<nonbreak>0–2 rolls attack or defense dice, if all of your <forcecharge> are active, you may spend 1 <forcecharge> and name a result. If the roll does not contain the named result, the ship must change 1<nonbreak>die to that result.</smallbody>

cards.name: •General Grievous
cards.ability_text: While you defend, after the Neutralize Results step, if there are 2 or more <hit>/<crit> results, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to cancel 1 <hit> or <crit><nonbreak>result. <return>After a friendly ship is destroyed, recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

cards.name: •DRK-1 Probe Droids
cards.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop or launch 1<nonbreak>DRK-1 probe droid using a speed 3 template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

cards.name: •<italic>Scimitar</italic>
cards.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> After the Place Forces step, you may cloak.<return>After you decloak, you may choose an enemy ship in your <bullseye>. If you do, it gains 1<nonbreak>jam token.</smallbody>

cards.name: •••Discord Missiles
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak>calculate token and 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to launch 1<nonbreak>buzz droid swarm using the [3<nonbreak><leftbank>], [3<nonbreak><straight>], or [3<nonbreak><rightbank>] template.<return>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.</smallbody>

cards.name: Dedicated
cards.ability_text: While another friendly ship in your <leftarc><nonbreak>or <rightarc> at range<nonbreak>0–2 defends, if it is limited or has the <smallcaps>Dedicated</smallcaps> upgrade and you are not strained, you may gain 1 strain token. If you do, the defender rerolls 1<nonbreak>of their blank results.

cards.name: Battle Meditation
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>You cannot coordinate limited ships.<return> While you perform a purple <coordinate> action, you may coordinate 1 additional friendly non-limited ship of the same type. Both ships must perform the same action.</smallbody>

cards.name: R4-P Astromech
cards.ability_text: Before you execute a basic maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, while you execute that maneuver, reduce its difficulty.

cards.name: •R4-P17
cards.ability_text: After you fully execute a red maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform an action, even while stressed.

cards.name: Delta-7B
cards.ability_text: <flavor>The Delta-7B was designed as a heavier variant of the Delta-7 <untalic>Aethersprite</untalic>-class Interceptor, identifiable by the repositioned astromech slot. Many Jedi Generals favor this craft’s greater firepower and durability.</flavor>

cards.name: Calibrated Laser Targeting
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if<nonbreak>the defender is in your <bullseye>, add 1<nonbreak><focus><nonbreak>result.

cards.name: Spare Parts Canisters
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to recover 1<nonbreak>charge on one of your equipped <astro> upgrades. <return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop 1 spare parts, then break all locks assigned to you.

cards.name: •R4-P44
cards.ability_text: After you fully execute a red maneuver, if there is an enemy ship in your <bullseye>, gain 1<nonbreak>calculate token.

cards.name: •Clone Commander Cody
cards.ability_text: After you perform an attack that missed, if 1<nonbreak>or more <hit>/<crit> results were neutralized, the defender gains 1<nonbreak>strain token.

cards.name: Seventh Fleet Gunner
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>While another friendly ship performs a primary attack, if the defender is in your firing arc, you may spend 1 <standardcharge>. If you do, the attacker rolls 1<nonbreak>additional die, to a maximum of 4. During the System Phase, you may gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 <standardcharge>.</smallbody>

cards.name: Synchronized Console
cards.ability_text: After you perform an attack, you may choose a friendly ship at range 1 or a friendly ship with the <smallcaps>Synchronized Console</smallcaps> upgrade at range 1–3 and spend a lock you have on the defender. If you do, the friendly ship you chose may acquire a lock on the defender.

cards.name: Grappling Struts (Closed)
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.<return>While you execute a maneuver, if you overlap an asteroid or debris cloud and there are 1 or fewer other friendly ships at range 0 of that obstacle, you may flip this card.

cards.name: •Chancellor Palpatine
cards.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.<return>After you defend, if the attacker is at range 0–2, you may spend 1 <forcecharge>. If you do, the attacker gains 1 stress token.<return>During the End Phase, you may flip this card.</smallbody>

cards.name: Passive Sensors
cards.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. You can only perform this action in your Perform Action step.</smallbody><return><smallbody>While your<nonbreak><standardcharge> is inactive, you cannot be coordinated. Before you engage, if your <standardcharge> is inactive, you may perform a<nonbreak><calculate> or<nonbreak><targetlock> action.</smallbody>

cards.name: Autoblasters
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If the defender is in your <bullseye>, roll 1 additional die. During the Neutralize Results step, if you are not in the defender’s<nonbreak><frontarc>, <evade><nonbreak>results do not cancel <crit><nonbreak>results.

cards.name: Plasma Torpedoes
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. During the Neutralize Results step, <crit><nonbreak>results are canceled before <hit><nonbreak>results. After this attack hits, the defender loses 1<nonbreak>shield.

cards.name: •Diamond-Boron Missiles
cards.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, each ship at range<nonbreak>0–1 of the defender with agility equal to or less than the defender's rolls 1<nonbreak>attack die and suffers 1<nonbreak><hit>/<crit> damage for each matching result.</smallbody>

cards.name: •Amilyn Holdo
cards.ability_text: Before you engage, you may choose another friendly ship at range<nonbreak>1–2. You may transfer to that ship 1 token of a type that ship does not have. That ship may transfer 1 token to you of a type you do not have.

cards.name: •GA-97
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Before placing forces, you may spend 3–5<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, choose another friendly ship and assign the <smallcaps>It’s the Resistance</smallcaps> condition to it.

cards.name: •Kaydel Connix
cards.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to a basic maneuver of the next higher speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

cards.name: •Korr Sella
cards.ability_text: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, remove all of your stress tokens.

cards.name: •Larma D’Acy
cards.ability_text: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform<nonbreak><reinforce>, <coordinate>, and<nonbreak><jam> actions, even while stressed.<return>While you perform a white<nonbreak><reinforce>, <coordinate>, or <jam> action, if you are stressed, treat that action as red.

cards.name: •Leia Organa
cards.ability_text: After a friendly ship reveals its dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, the chosen ship reduces the difficulty of that maneuver.

cards.name: •PZ-4CO
cards.ability_text: At the end of the Activation Phase, you may choose 1<nonbreak>friendly ship at range<nonbreak>1–2.  If you do, transfer 1<nonbreak>calculate token to that ship.  If your revealed maneuver is blue, you may transfer 1 focus token instead.

cards.name: •R2-A6
cards.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to a maneuver of the same bearing of a speed 1<nonbreak>higher or lower.

cards.name: •R2-C4
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak>evade token to change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to a <hit><nonbreak>result.

cards.name: •TA-175
cards.ability_text: After a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–3 with<nonbreak><calculate> on its action bar is destroyed, each friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–3 with<nonbreak><calculate> in its action bar gains 1<nonbreak>calculate token.

cards.name: •Electro-Proton Bomb
cards.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return><smallbody>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop an Electro-Proton Bomb with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template. Then place 1<nonbreak>fuse marker on that device.</smallbody><return><smallbody>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.</smallbody>

cards.name: Delayed Fuses
cards.ability_text: After you drop, launch, or place a bomb or mine, you may place 1<nonbreak>fuse marker on that device.

cards.name: Angled Deflectors
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Starfighter shields often have manual overrides that allow them to be angled for increased front or rear protection. However, doing so leaves the ship exposed if the pilot’s situational awareness falters.</flavor>
cards.restrictions_raw: Small or medium ship, Shield value of<nonbreak>1<nonbreak>or<nonbreak>more.

cards.name: Landing Struts (Closed)
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.<return>While you execute a maneuver, if you overlap an asteroid or debris cloud and there are 1<nonbreak>or fewer other friendly ships at range<nonbreak>0 of that obstacle, you may flip this card.

cards.name: Landing Struts (Open)
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>You ignore obstacles at range<nonbreak>0 and while you move through them. After you reveal your dial, if you reveal a maneuver other than a [2<nonbreak><straight>] and are at range<nonbreak>0 of an asteroid or debris cloud, skip your Execute Maneuver step and remove 1<nonbreak>stress token; if you revealed a right or left maneuver, rotate your ship 90° in that direction. After you execute a maneuver, flip this card.</smallbody>

cards.name: Ensnare
cards.ability_text: At the end of the Activation Phase, if you are tractored, you may choose 1<nonbreak>ship in your <turretarc><nonbreak>arc at range<nonbreak>0–1. Transfer 1<nonbreak>tractor token to it.

cards.name: Gravitic Deflection
cards.ability_text: While you defend, you may reroll 1<nonbreak>defense die for each tractored ship in<nonbreak>the attack arc.

cards.name: Snap Shot
cards.ability_text: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may perform this attack against it as a<nonbreak>bonus attack.<return><smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> Your dice cannot be modified.

cards.name: Foresight
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform this attack against it as a<nonbreak>bonus attack.</smallbody><return><smallbody><smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> You may change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to a<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>result; your dice cannot be modified otherwise.</smallbody>

cards.name: Precognitive Reflexes
cards.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform a<nonbreak><barrelroll><nonbreak>or<nonbreak><boost><nonbreak>action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on<nonbreak>your action bar, gain 1<nonbreak>strain token.<return>If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

cards.name: •Ahsoka Tano
cards.ability_text: After you execute a maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> and choose a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>1–3 in your firing arc. If you do, it may perform a red<nonbreak><focus><nonbreak>action, even while stressed.

cards.name: •C-3PO
cards.ability_text: While you defend, if you are calculating, you may reroll 1<nonbreak>defense die.<return>After you perform a <calculate> action, gain 1<nonbreak>calculate token.

cards.name: •C1-10P (Erratic)
cards.ability_text: After you execute a maneuver, you <bold>must</bold> choose a ship at range<nonbreak>0–1. It<nonbreak>gains 1<nonbreak>jam token.

cards.name: •C1-10P
cards.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.</smallbody><return><smallbody>After you execute a maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a red<nonbreak><evade><nonbreak>action, even while stressed.</smallbody><return><smallbody>During the End Phase, if this card has 0<nonbreak> active <standardcharge>, flip it.</smallbody>

cards.name: Targeting Computer
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Targeting computers are standard features on many vessels, especially those designed to deliver ordnance. Some light starfighters and transport craft lack such weapons guidance, though it can be installed as an after-market modification.</flavor>

cards.name: •R1-J5
cards.ability_text: While you have 2<nonbreak>or fewer stress tokens, you can perform actions on damage cards even while stressed.<return>After you repair a damage card with the <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> trait, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to repair that card again.

cards.name: Stabilized S-foils (Open)
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>After you perform an attack, you may spend your lock on the defender to perform a bonus <cannon><nonbreak>attack against that ship using a <cannon><nonbreak>upgrade you have not attacked with this turn.</smallbody><return><smallbody>Before you activate, if you are not critically damaged, you may flip this card.</smallbody>

cards.name: Stabilized S-foils (Closed)
cards.ability_text: Before you activate, if you are not critically damaged, you may flip this card.

cards.name: •K-2SO
cards.ability_text: During the System Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–3.  That ship gains 1<nonbreak>calculate and 1<nonbreak>stress token.

cards.name: Cluster Mines
cards.ability_text: <bitalic>Mine</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop a Cluster Mine set using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.<return>This card’s<nonbreak><standardcharge> cannot be recovered.

cards.name: Ion Bombs
cards.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop an Ion Bomb using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

cards.name: Coaxium Hyperfuel
cards.ability_text: You can perform the <slam> action even while stressed. If you do, you suffer 1<nonbreak><crit> damage unless you expose 1<nonbreak>of your damage cards.<return>After you partially execute a maneuver, you may expose 1<nonbreak>of your damage cards or suffer 1<nonbreak><crit> damage to perform a <SLAM> action.

cards.name: Mag-Pulse Warheads
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1<nonbreak><crit> damage and gains 1<nonbreak>deplete and 1<nonbreak>jam token. Then cancel all <hit>/<crit><nonbreak>results.

cards.name: False Tradition
cards.ability_text: Treat your <focus><nonbreak>actions as red.

cards.name: Proud Tradition
cards.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.</smallbody><return><smallbody>While you have 2<nonbreak>or fewer stress tokens, you may perform <focus><nonbreak>actions even while stressed.</smallbody><return><smallbody>After you perform an attack, if you are stressed, the defender may spend 1<nonbreak>focus token or suffer 1<nonbreak><crit> damage to flip this card.</smallbody>

cards.name: Deuterium Power Cells
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.</smallbody><return><smallbody>Before you would gain 1<nonbreak>non-lock<nonbreak>token, if you are not stressed, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to gain 1<nonbreak>stress token instead.</smallbody>

cards.name: •Kaz’s <italic>Fireball</italic>
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> When you resolve <smallcaps>Explosion with Wings</smallcaps>, you may search the damage deck and choose a damage card with the <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> trait; you are dealt that card instead. Then, shuffle the damage deck.<return>You can perform actions on damage cards even while ionized.
